portfolioInvestment.title: Fitness
portfolioInvestment.description: PCG invests in companies that focus on fitness, health, and overall maintenance of the body, mind and spirit. This may include gyms/fitness centers, fitness equipment companies, clothing companies, sporting goods companies. The different methods by which people train for fitness has expanded greatly over the last couple of years and we aim to be at the forefront of these shifts.

portfolioInvestment.title: Food & Beverage
portfolioInvestment.description: The food and beverage industry is comprised of all companies involved in processing raw food materials, packaging, and distributing them. This includes fresh, prepared foods as well as packaged foods, and nonalcoholic beverages.

portfolioInvestment.title: Consumer Services / Retail
portfolioInvestment.description: Consumer Services refers to services for personal, household or domestic use or consumption. PCG is interested in consumer services geared toward consumer products in food, herbs, beverages, vitamins, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, hair products, household cleaners, etc.

portfolioInvestment.title: Lifestyle
portfolioInvestment.description: Lifestyle brands embody values, aspirations, interests, attitudes, or opinions of groups or cultures and seek to inspire, guide, and motivate people, with the goal of their products contributing to the definition of the consumer's way of life. A business becomes a lifestyle brand by focusing on evoking an emotional connection with its customers, creating a desire for a consumer to be affiliated with a particular group or brand.

portfolioInvestment.title: Supplements
portfolioInvestment.description: Supplements include vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and herbs or botanicals, as well as other substances that can be used to supplement the diet. Dietary supplements come in many forms, including tablets, capsules, powders, energy bars, and liquids. People use dietary supplements for a wide assortment of reasons - diets, medical conditions, boost energy, or to get a good night's sleep.
